mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login (user_no, id, pw, salt) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{id}, #{pw}, #{salt})
INSERT INTO users_sub (user_no, addr, phone, email) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{addr}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT user_no `user.no`, pw, salt FROM login WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT no, gender, `both`, location_no `location.no`, credential FROM users WHERE no = #{no}
